subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In five starts this season, Chien-Ming Wang is 0-4 with a 21.60 earned run average. Manager Joe Girardi has said that another bad start would jeopardize his status as a starter.
snippet: In five starts this season, Chien-Ming Wang is 0-4 with a 21.60 earned run average. Manager Joe Girardi has said that another bad start would jeopardize his status as a starter.
